title: Port Stephens Private Pool Villa Escape for up to 12 Guests
description:
Escape to one of Port Stephens' most breathtaking beaches for an exquisite stay at La Luna Holiday House Port Stephens - a palatial private pool villa sleeping up to 12 guests.

Soak up the white-sand beaches, dramatic sand dunes and clear aquamarine waters of Port Stephens and the Hunter Region, staying in Shoal Bay, less than 10 minutes' walk from the local beach, restaurants and caf√©s. Your incredible luxury villa offers six bedrooms, four bathrooms, a gourmet chef's kitchen, huge living areas and a spacious yard with private pool and cabana.

Bring your family and friends along and enjoy two bottles of wine on arrival, a dolphin cruise and sandboarding experience for two adults and a leisurely 12pm checkout.
location_description: La Luna Holiday House Port Stephens
